title: Admiral Function Discovery — discovery
text: object class spec_tbl_df (inherits tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) 338 rows 9 columns.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: get_admiral_deprecated(): Returns tibble deprecated functions admiral, admiralonco, admiralophtha, admiralvaccine packages. get_admiral_superseded(): Returns tibble superseded functions admiral, admiralonco, admiralophtha, admiralvaccine packages. get_fns_with_keyword(): Returns character vector functions passed keyword help file. example, function can used find deprecated superseded functions admiral universe, admiral package include #' @keywords deprecated #' @keywords superseded function's roxygen2 comments.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
code: get_admiral_deprecated()  get_admiral_superseded()  get_fns_with_keyword(package, keyword, lib.loc = NULL)

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: package character string naming installed package. keyword string keyword identify lib.loc character vector directory names R libraries,     NULL.  default value NULL corresponds     libraries currently known.  specified library trees used     search package.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: character vector function names

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
code: get_admiral_deprecated() #> # A tibble: 0 × 2 #> # ℹ 2 variables: package <chr>, fn <chr> get_admiral_superseded() #> # A tibble: 13 × 2 #>    package     fn                          #>    <chr>       <chr>                       #>  1 admiral     date_source                 #>  2 admiral     derive_param_extreme_record #>  3 admiral     derive_var_dthcaus          #>  4 admiral     derive_var_extreme_dt       #>  5 admiral     derive_var_extreme_dtm      #>  6 admiral     dthcaus_source              #>  7 admiral     get_summary_records         #>  8 admiralonco derive_param_bor            #>  9 admiralonco derive_param_clinbenefit    #> 10 admiralonco derive_param_confirmed_bor  #> 11 admiralonco derive_param_confirmed_resp #> 12 admiralonco derive_param_response       #> 13 admiralonco filter_pd                   get_fns_with_keyword(package = "admiral", keyword = "superseded") #> [1] "date_source"                 "derive_param_extreme_record" #> [3] "derive_var_dthcaus"          "derive_var_extreme_dt"       #> [5] "derive_var_extreme_dtm"      "dthcaus_source"              #> [7] "get_summary_records"
